text: Gianni Serra (14 December 1933 - 3 September 2020) was an Italian director and writer of movies, television and theatre. He was born in Montichiari, Italy. He was known for writing and directing the movies Uno dei tre (1973), Fortezze vuote (1975), La ragazza di via Millelire (1980) and Una lepre con la faccia di bambina (1988).
